program main

  implicit none

  integer :: n, m, i, count1, idx, num_digits
  integer*8 :: count_total, x, newNumber, ans, quotient
  integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: a
  integer, dimension(20) :: digits

  ! First part: read input and compute count_total

  read *, n
  allocate(a(1:n))
  read *, a(1:n)

  ! Find m (index of maximum absolute value)
  m = 1
  do i = 2, n
     if (abs(a(i)) > abs(a(m))) then
        m = i
     end if
  end do

  ! Compute count1: number of elements with opposite sign to a(m)
  count1 = 0
  do i = 1, n
     if ( (a(m) >= 0) .neqv. (a(i) >= 0) ) then
        count1 = count1 + 1
     end if
  end do

  count_total = count1 + (n - 1)

  ! Second part: process count_total to get newNumber
  x = count_total
  idx = 0
  do while (x > 0)
     integer :: digit, original_x
     digit = mod(x, 10)
     original_x = x
     x = x / 10
     if (9 - digit < digit) then
        if ( (original_x / 10 == 0) .and. (9 - digit == 0) ) then
           digits(idx + 1) = digit
        else
           digits(idx + 1) = 9 - digit
        end if
     else
        digits(idx + 1) = digit
     end if
     idx = idx + 1
  end do

  num_digits = idx
  newNumber = 0
  integer :: pow = 1
  do i = 1, num_digits
     newNumber = newNumber + digits(i) * pow
     pow = pow * 10
  end do

  ! Third part: compute ans using newNumber as n
  ans = 0
  do i = 1, newNumber
     quotient = newNumber / i
     ans = ans + i * quotient * (quotient + 1) / 2
  end do

  print *, ans

end program main
